item.title: Episode 111: Pweef Pweef

Bobby is very insecure about a strapping young former UFC heavyweight fighter.

Khalyla finds similarities between her lover and Sir Elton John.

Gilbert defends his queen.

FYI: Mr. Lee was gravely ill during the recording of this podcast and therefore exempts himself from anything disparaging comments he might have made about friends and colleagues while overloaded with NyQuil.

FYI: Khalyla was not ill, has no excuses, but still asks for your forgiveness.

FYI: Gilbert is still gay.

We don't know shit. We never have. We don't know what the next year holds but we hope it's a beautiful one for all of you.

Happy New Year, babybellies!
